name: Slow Bolt Cilantro Seeds
description: Slow Bolt is the perfect beginner-friendly cilantro. One of the most popular herbs, cilantro is considered essential to the cuisines of many cultures.

name: Italian Roma Bush Tomato Seeds
description: An absolutely excellent heirloom tomato. Firm, meaty, 3 inch oblong fruits with few seeds, on compact vines that are very productive.

name: Soundwave Jalapeno Chile Pepper Seeds
description: This pepper is an extra-large jalapeno variety with dark green, thick walled fruit. This high-yielding variety also carries some heat, making it great to make sauces or sautee with.

name: Vivian Romaine Lettuce Seeds
description: This emerald green lettuce will be a gem in your garden. 'Vivian' has crisp leaves wrapped in tight heads, making its large leaves the perfect choice for impressive salads or tender lettuce wraps.

name: Potting Soil
description: This organic Seed Stating soil mix is a rich blend of sphagnum peat moss & perlite with yucca extract and lime to ensure correct pH.

name: Small Modular Metal Garden Bed
description: Level up your garden setup with this beautiful hard-working beds. They're made from ultra-durable aluzinc steel for better drainage, healthier soil, longer growing seasons, and bountiful harvests.

name: Round Metal Garden Bed
description: Level up your garden setup with these beautiful, round hard-working beds. Made from ultra-durable aluzinc steel and raised for better drainage, healthier soil and fruitful harvests.

name: Small Tall Metal Garden Bed
description: This small yet tall raised garden bed is ultra-durable and perfect for urban and suburban gardeners, especially those that have a small or narrow yard.

name: 6-Cell Seed Starting Tray
description: The Epic 6-Cell Seed Starting Tray is built tough with just the right amount of flexibility. It's designed by real gardeners and made in the USA from high-strength recycled plastic that's UV-treated and BPA-free.

name: Hand Trowel
description: Made of stainless steel for durability and long life, this sturdy trowel is essential for digging, furrowing, and all general garden work.

name: Garden Leather Gloves
description: These working gloves allow for dexterity, flexibility, and breathability ensuring you can work with ease

name: Glass Garden Stake
description: Perfect for your small indoor and outdoor plant pots, these watering stakes are a must-have option for an automatic watering system, slowly releasing needed water into the soil.
